trans-unit.source: Sets the way that methods and properties in the proxy are bound to the corresponding members in the host application's object model.
trans-unit.target: 设置将代理中的方法和属性绑定到主机应用程序的对象模型中相应成员的方式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method or property in the host application's object model.
trans-unit.target: 主机应用程序的对象模型中方法或属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name will usually be the same as the method or property name in the proxy type.
trans-unit.target: 此名称通常与代理类型中的方法或属性名称相同。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.HostMemberAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.HostMemberAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> enumeration value that controls binding and the way in which the search for members and types is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 枚举值，该值控制绑定以及通过反射执行成员和类型搜索的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that controls binding and the way in which the search for members and types is conducted by reflection.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个枚举值，该值控制绑定以及通过反射执行成员和类型搜索的方式。

trans-unit.source: When a member of a proxy type is invoked by an add-in, the .NET Framework reads this property and uses the specified <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> value (if any) to invoke the host application object model method or property.
trans-unit.target: 当通过外接程序调用的代理类型的成员时，.NET Framework 读取此属性，并使用指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>值 （如果有） 来调用主机应用程序对象模型方法或属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the member in the host application that the member in the proxy represents.
trans-unit.target: 获取代理中的成员代表的主机应用程序中的成员名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member in the host application that corresponds to the member in the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 中的主机应用程序代理中的成员所对应的成员的名称。
